feature1.explanation: Both texts use a similar punctuation style with colons and commas being utilized in a comparable manner.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in lexical and grammatical features, sentence structures, and narrative styles, along with some similarities in punctuation style and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate.
